div.h4: Welcome to UP Academy Boston! Serving more than 490 6th-8th grade students in Boston since 2011, UP Academy Boston is a mission-driven community of passionate and dedicated educators.

li.span: School Restarted: Patrick F. Gavin Middle School
Address: 215 Dorchester Street, South Boston, MA 02127
*Doors open at 7:15 am for breakfast Monday-Friday
*Students who have homework club or detention will be dismissed at 3:30pm.

p.span: UP Academy Boston & UP Academy Dorchester are Horace Mann charter schools and are governed by the UP Academy Boston & UP Academy Dorchester Board of Trustees.

li.span: – Team Lead Crimson Preferred Scheduling, Tufts Medical Center
– Senior Vice President of Product and Portfolio Management at Pearson
– Chief Academic Officer, Excel Academy Charter Schools
– Senior Portfolio Manager, Columbia Threadneedle Investments
– Senior Vice President, Head of Advisors and Family Offices, Fiera Capital

br.span: UP Academy Boston is a tuition-free, public school open to all Boston scholars who are incoming 6th-8th graders. UP Academy Boston enrolls students through a random, city-wide lottery as required by Massachusetts law. An application is needed to enter the UP Academy Boston lottery, but no test scores, grades, recommendations, or history will be taken into consideration.

p.span: Interested in learning more about one of our schools? Schedule a tour!
Tours of UP Academy Boston can be scheduled:
To schedule your tour of UP Academy Boston, email enrollment@upacademyboston.org or call 617-635-8819.

section.h5: Apply To UP Academy Boston Now!
section.p: Applications are now LIVE for the 2020-21 school year. To enroll your child, you can apply online or download and submit an application via mail, in-person, email, or fax. The first application deadline is Friday, February 28th, 2020 at 4PM. The lottery will be held on Wednesday, March 4th, 2020 at 5pm. Starting on March 13th, there will be an application deadline every Friday until all available seats have been filled. We will be offering to students who have applied on a rolling basis as long as there are available seats.

a.span: ATTENTION! UAB will be closed beginning on Tuesday

img.alt:
ATTENTION! UAB will be closed beginning on Tuesday and continuing through April 27 (unless circumstances drastically change before then). We will be open tomorrow. We understand and respect that families may choose to not send their children. These absences will not count negatively for any child.
Be safe.

img.alt: Today, over 100 of @upacademyboston’s students with the best attendance for the year enjoyed a pizza party and games! Didn’t get to attend? That’s ok! We are tracking attendance over the next 6 weeks, culminating in a school dance known as the #AttenDANCE!
